page.title: 16TRANSPORT IN GLENAGOORLAND
page.content: The most common transport about this area is a car.Almost everybody has a car in this area.You would need a car if you were goingto Londonderry or Strabane as there is a very poor bus service.It is eleven miles to Londonderry and nine miles to Strabane,However most people would go to the Super-market to do their shopping in Donemana,Londonderry or Strabane.Shoes,clothes,meat and household goods can be bought in Donemana,but to get to furniture shops,dentists,travel agents ,sports shops it is necessary to go to Strabane or Londonderry.The roads about here are very narrow and have alot of sharp bends.They are tarmac and have alot of hills .Some lanes up to houses have rough roads but some are tarmac and some are concrete. Some people have a motor bikes.
